interface.name: DifferentiableMultivariateOptimizer
interface.javadoc:
This interface represents an optimization algorithm for{@link DifferentiableMultivariateFunction scalar differentiable objective functions}. Optimization algorithms find the input point set that either {@link GoalTypemaximize or minimize} an objective function.
MultivariateOptimizer
DifferentiableMultivariateVectorOptimizer
